mapper.select: select * from CHATTINGROOM where (ARTIST_ID = #{artistId} AND CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}) OR (ARTIST_ID = #{customerId} AND CUSTOMER_ID = #{artistId})
select CHAT.*,TO_CHAR(chat_chatdate, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHAT_CHATDATEFORMAT from chat WHERE ROOM_CODE= #{roomCode} ORDER BY CHAT_CHATDATEFORMAT

select * from (select * from chat where (room_code, chat_chatDate) in (select room_code, max(chat_chatDate) as chat_chatDate from chat group by room_code) order by chat_chatDate desc) where sender = #{userId} or reciver = #{userId}
